title: COTTON AND SILK KAFTAN WITH PRINT
desc: Long cotton and silk kaftan with decorative, placed floral print. Boasting an elastic insert with drawstring at the waist, this piece features an embroidered motif on the edges.• Loose fit• V-neck• Wide sleeves• Elastic insert with drawstring• Made in Italy• The model is 5' 9½" (177 cm) tall and wears a size 40
